recently.

Kathe

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 598
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone~ Kelly or Leslie, I have a question about unschooling in SC and option #3.  From my understanding, you have to sign up with a group to report
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone~

Kelly or Leslie, I have a question about unschooling in SC and option #3. From my understanding, you have to sign up with a group to report to..is that correct? My family and I will be moving down there in Feb and my daughter is 5, so we'll have to get things set up pretty quickly I'm assuming.

Also, I've been searching for a calendar "planner" to keep a log in and can't seem to find one with enough space per day..any suggestions? or do you just use a journal?

Thanks a lot!




Kim Griffin
